name: Report to legislature
text: §36-6  Report to legislature.  The director of finance shall make an annual report to the legislature of the transactions and business of the director's department, showing the revenue and expenditure for the preceding year, and giving a full and detailed estimate of the revenue and expenditure for the succeeding year. [CC 1859, §470; RL 1925, §1244; RL 1935, §2203; RL 1945, §5804; RL 1955, §132-4; am L Sp 1959 1st, c 13, §2; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §36-6; gen ch 1985]
